Mildred’s ideal home is one where she’s the star of the show, she prefers to fly solo, as she’s still working on her communication skills with other animals. Though with humans, she’s a pro at making sure you know when it’s time for pets, play, and plenty of pampering.
Despite her age, Mildred is full of life and enjoys cozy sunspots, gentle playtime, and cuddles. She’s looking for a loving forever home where she can bask in affection and enjoy her golden years.
